to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: ftp configuration clarification
body:
Spie,

Many thanks. Your observations are very sobering. I do keep good logs
here, but do not scan them as often as I should. 

Chuck
